t: 1 Chronicles 25
The Levitical Musicians

David*p and the officers of the army also set apart some of the sons of Asaph, Heman, and Jeduthun, who were to prophesy accompanied by lyres, harps, and cymbals. This is the list of the men who performed their service:
From*ln Asaph’s sons: Zaccur,*ln Joseph, Nethaniah, and Asarelah, sons of Asaph, under Asaph’s authority, who prophesied under the authority of the king.

From*ln Jeduthun: Jeduthun’s sons: Gedaliah,*ln Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah, and Mattithiah — six — under the authority of their father Jeduthun, prophesying to the accompaniment of lyres, giving thanks and praise to the Lord.*s
From*ln Heman: Heman’s sons: Bukkiah,*ln Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth.
All these sons of Heman, the king’s seer, were given by the promises of God to exalt him, for God had given Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.

All*p these men were under their own fathers’ authority for the music in the Lord’s*s temple, with cymbals, harps, and lyres for the service of God’s temple. Asaph, Jeduthun, and Heman were under the king’s authority.
They numbered 288 together with their relatives who were all trained and skillful in music for the Lord.*s
They cast lots for their duties, young and old alike, teacher as well as pupil.
The*le first lot for Asaph fell to Joseph, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg to*le Gedaliah the second: him, his relatives, and his sons — 12*lg
the*le third to Zaccur, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le fourth to Izri, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le fifth to Nethaniah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le sixth to Bukkiah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le seventh to Jesarelah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le eighth to Jeshaiah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le ninth to Mattaniah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le tenth to Shimei, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le eleventh to Azarel, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le twelfth to Hashabiah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le thirteenth to Shubael, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le fourteenth to Mattithiah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le fifteenth to Jeremoth, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le sixteenth to Hananiah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le seventeenth to Joshbekashah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le eighteenth to Hanani, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le nineteenth to Mallothi, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le twentieth to Eliathah, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le twenty-first to Hothir, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le twenty-second to Giddalti, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
the*le twenty-third to Mahazioth, his sons, and his relatives — 12*lg
and*le the twenty-fourth to Romamti-ezer, his sons, and his relatives — 12.*lg
